title: Spindrift
description: Handwoven & handprinted with tiny wavy lines printed over alternating 6.5\" & 12.75\" vert. stripes.  Vert. rpt. 36\"; horiz. 19.5\". Tiny pink Horizontal wavy lines handprinted over alternating 6-1/2\" & 12-3/4\" vertical stripes of gray & pomegranite.Horiz. Rpt. 19-1/4\" Pomegranate
